00043 define('GD_NOT_LOADED', 1);
00044 define('ENCODING_UNHANDLED', 2);
00045 
00046 /* CONFIGURATION */
00047 // color
00048 $bar_color = array(0,0,0);
00049 $bg_color = array(255,255,255);
00050 $text_color = array(0,0,0);
00051 
00052 // TTF font location
00053 $font_loc = "./DejaVuSans.ttf";
00054 
00055 // genbarcode binary location
00056 if (strripos(PHP_OS, 'WIN') !== false) {
00057     $genbarcode_loc = '.\bin\win\genbarcode.exe';
00058 } else {
00059     $genbarcode_loc = './bin/nix/genbarcode';
00060 }
00061 
00062 // default barcode filename
00063 $barcode_text = 'barcode';

00065 /* CONFIGURATION ENDS HERE */
00066 
00067 require "encode_bars.php"; /* build-in encoders */

00081 function barcode_outimage($text, $bars, $scale = 1, $mode = "png", $total_y = 0, $space = '')
00082 {
00083     global $bar_color, $bg_color, $text_color;
00084     global $font_loc;
00085     global $barcode_text;
00086     /* set defaults */
00087     if ($scale<1) $scale = 2;
00088         $total_y = intval($total_y);
00089 
00090     if ($total_y < 1) $total_y = intval($scale * 60);
00091     if (!$space)
00092         $space = array( 'top' => 2*$scale, 'bottom' => 2*$scale, 'left' => 2*$scale, 'right' => 2*$scale);
00093 
00094     /* count total width */
00095     $xpos = 0;
00096     $width = true;
00097     for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($bars) ;$i++){
00098         $val = strtolower($bars[$i]);
00099         if ($width){
00100             $xpos +=  $val*$scale;
00101             $width = false;
00102             continue;
00103         }
00104         if (ereg("[a-z]", $val)) {
00105             /* tall bar */
00106             $val = ord($val)-ord('a')+1;
00107         }
00108 
00109         $xpos +=  $val*$scale;
00110         $width = true;
00111     }
00112 
00113     /* allocate the image */
00114     $total_x = ( $xpos )+$space['right']+$space['right'];
00115     $xpos = $space['left'];
00116     /* checking for GD library */
00117     if (!function_exists("imagecreate")) {
00118         return GD_NOT_LOADED;
00119     }
00120 
00121     $im = imagecreate($total_x, $total_y);
00122     /* create two images */
00123     $col_bg = ImageColorAllocate($im, $bg_color[0], $bg_color[1], $bg_color[2]);
00124     $col_bar = ImageColorAllocate($im, $bar_color[0], $bar_color[1], $bar_color[2]);
00125     $col_text = ImageColorAllocate($im, $text_color[0], $text_color[1], $text_color[2]);
00126     $height = round($total_y-($scale*10));
00127     $height2 = round($total_y-$space['bottom']);
00128 
00129     /* paint the bars */
00130     $width = true;
00131     for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($bars); $i++){
00132         $val = strtolower($bars[$i]);
00133         if ($width){
00134             $xpos += $val*$scale;
00135             $width = false;
00136             continue;
00137         }
00138         if (ereg("[a-z]", $val)){
00139             /* tall bar */
00140             $val = ord($val)-ord('a')+1;
00141             $h = $height2;
00142         } else
00143             $h = $height;
00144 
00145         imagefilledrectangle($im, $xpos, $space['top'], $xpos+($val*$scale)-1, $h, $col_bar);
00146         $xpos += $val*$scale;
00147         $width = true;
00148     }
00149 
00150     /* write out the text */
00151     $chars = explode(' ', $text);
00152     reset($chars);
00153     while (list($n, $v) = each($chars)) {
00154         if (trim($v)){
00155             $inf = explode(":", $v);
00156             $fontsize = $scale*($inf[1]/1.8);
00157             $fontheight = $total_y-($fontsize/2.7)+2;
00158             @imagettftext($im, $fontsize, 0, $space['left']+($scale*$inf[0])+2, $fontheight, $col_text, $font_loc, $inf[2]);
00159         }
00160     }
00161 
00162     $mode = strtolower($mode);
00163     /* replac any space in barcode text */
00164     $text = str_replace(' ', '_', $text);
00165     /* replace space */
00166     $barcode_text = str_replace(array(' ', '/', '\/'), '_', $barcode_text);
00167     /* replace invalid characters */
00168     $barcode_text = str_replace(array(':', ',', '*', '@'), '', $barcode_text);
00169     /* output the image */
00170     if ($mode == 'jpg' || $mode == 'jpeg'){
00171         header('Content-Type: image/jpeg');
00172         imagejpeg($im, '../../images/barcodes/'.$barcode_text.'.jpg');
00173     } else if ($mode == 'gif'){
00174         header('Content-Type: image/gif');
00175         imagegif($im, '../../images/barcodes/'.$barcode_text.'.gif');
00176     } else {
00177         header('Content-Type: image/png');
00178         imagepng($im, '../../images/barcodes/'.$barcode_text.'.png');
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00191 function barcode_encode_genbarcode($code, $encoding){
00192     global $genbarcode_loc;
00193     /* delete EAN-13 checksum */
00194     if (eregi("^ean$", $encoding) && strlen($code) == 13) $code = substr($code,0,12);
00195     if (!$encoding) $encoding = "ANY";
00196     $encoding = ereg_replace("[|\\]", "_", $encoding);
00197     $code = ereg_replace("[|\\]", "_", $code);
00198     $cmd = $genbarcode_loc.' "'.str_replace('"', '\"',$code)."\" \"".str_replace("\"", "\\\"",strtoupper($encoding))."\"";
00199     echo "$cmd<br />\n";
00200     $fp = popen($cmd, "r");
00201     if ($fp) {
00202         $bars = fgets($fp, 1024);
00203         $text = fgets($fp, 1024);
00204         $encoding = fgets($fp, 1024);
00205         pclose($fp);
00206     } else {
00207         return false;
00208     }
00209 
00210     $ret = array(
00211         'encoding' => trim($encoding),
00212         'bars' => trim($bars),
00213         'text' => trim($text)
00214         );
00215     if (!$ret['encoding']) return false;
00216     if (!$ret['bars']) return false;
00217     if (!$ret['text']) return false;
00218     return $ret;
00219 }
00220 
00245 function barcode_encode($code, $encoding){
00246     global $genbarcode_loc;
00247     if (
00248         ((eregi("^ean$", $encoding)
00249          && ( strlen($code) == 12 || strlen($code) == 13)))
00250 
00251         || (($encoding) && (eregi("^isbn$", $encoding))
00252          && (( strlen($code) == 9 || strlen($code) == 10) ||
00253          (((ereg("^978", $code) && strlen($code) == 12) ||
00254           (strlen($code) == 13)))))
00255 
00256         || (( !isset($encoding) || !$encoding || (eregi("^ANY$", $encoding) ))
00257          && (ereg("^[0-9]{12,13}$", $code)))
00258 
00259         ) {
00260         /* use built-in EAN-Encoder */
00261         $bars = barcode_encode_ean($code, $encoding);
00262     } else if (file_exists($genbarcode_loc)) {
00263         /* use genbarcode */
00264         $bars = barcode_encode_genbarcode($code, $encoding);
00265     } else {
00266         return ENCODING_UNHANDLED;
00267     }
00268     return $bars;
00269 }
00270 
00282 function barcode_print($code, $encoding = '128B', $scale = 2 ,$mode = 'png' )
00283 {
00284     global $barcode_text;
00285     $barcode_text = $code;
00286     // encode barcode
00287     $bars = barcode_encode($code, $encoding);
00288     if ($bars == ENCODING_UNHANDLED) {
00289         return false;
00290     }
00291     // set filetype mode
00292     if (!$mode) {
00293         $mode = 'png';
00294     }
00295     // output the image
00296     barcode_outimage($bars['text'], $bars['bars'], $scale, $mode);
00297 }
